teacher_info.intro:
I teach English, Mandarin, and Cantonese *我教英文, 中文和粤语* 
I am a TEFL-certified teacher. I got my Bachelor's degree in Psychology in the States, after graduated I did some conservation volunteering in Australia, and then I did a cultural exchange for my gap year in China before studying for my Master's degree in Linguistics at Leeds, UK. I made friends with people from all these countries and more. I speak the languages I teach, and basic Malay. I can read some German and Korean, I used to study them in college but I got really rusty now. And I'm also learning French now. I love movies, food, writing, beach, exploring new cities, visiting gorgeous museums, and quirky local cafés.

I'm from Beijing, China， I majored in journalism at university. I have the First level Certificate of Mandarin. I like Chinese traditional culture and food. I wish to make friends with you. I will do my best to help you improve your spoken Chinese.Please give me a chance to introduce myself.
我出生于中国北京，是一名地地道道的北京姑娘。专业是新闻学。拥有普通话一级乙等证书，和教育局颁发的教育学证书。喜欢中国传统文化和美食，愿和大家成为朋友，尽我所能帮助大家提高汉语口语水平。

***Due to the military service, I temporarily teach on weekends, but feel free to ask if I am still available during weekdays for class!***
***服兵役的緣故，我暫時以週末教學為主，但有週間上課的需求也歡迎提出！***

My name is Edison.  I am 23 years old Taiwanese, native Mandarin speaker, born and raised in Taiwan. Graduating from National Taiwan University and currently doing my military service, I have been teaching languages for more than 5 years. Also, I’ve been to a lot of countries in Asia as well as in Europe and I really enjoy getting to know different people all over the world. Looking forward to seeing you in class!

我叫 Edison，23 歲的土生土長台灣人，畢業於國立台灣大學畢業，目前服役中。我是一名中文母語者，有 5 年以上的教學經驗。同時，我也非常熱愛旅行和認識世界各地的人。期待在課堂上見到你！

Hi, my name is Lisa Xiuqiong Li. I have been studying and living in Canada for 8 years. I have held a bachelor's degree in Accounting. Before I moved to Canada, I had worked at a post-secondary institution as a professional teacher in China for 6 years.  During this period, I gained People's Republic of China Teacher's Qualification License. I've been living in Canada since 2012 and have taught Mandarin Chinese at three Chinese culture schools since 2014. Also, I am a successful online teacher at Preply.com. In my free time, I like reading books,  watching movies, swimming, travelling and cooking Chinese food.

My name is Jing. I am an online interpreter who is working in Toronto. I am interpreting between English and Mandarin over the phone. I have a lot of funny stories to share about my job. My program was English at university. I passed the nationwide mandarin level test at high marks when I was in the university. I have lived in Beijing for 5 years engaging in international business. I have some practical advice to provide for you if you have plans to study or travel in Beijing.

Hey! I'm Sherry and from Guangdong province. I can speak standard Cantonese and Mandarin, because they both are my mother tongues. Besides, I speak other two dialects in my city. I really like dialects. If you're interested in dialects or linguistics, we can talk about it. 
I‘ve studied translation and interpretation (inc. linguistics) during postgraduate period. So I can help you exchange two languages and do some translation practice in the lesson. Because of my previous working experience, I have strong international social skills. And I am communicative, out-going and easy-going. In my free time I like to learn languages, edit vedios and watch stage plays.

Hello! I am Amy who was born and grew up in Hong Kong. I have always been working in the cultural sector and love travelling a lot to meet people from different backgrounds. I am fluent in English, Cantonese and Mandarin. I am also currently learning Hebrew as it is one of the ancient languages which I find it fascinating!

I am from Southern China and currently living in the UK. After graduating from university, I worked as interpreter for an Italian company, then and as a project coordinator for a British-based company. Now I am doing my own business by exporting electronics around the world. I love travelling, especially hitchhiking and couch-surfing as it allows me to meet a lot of different people and travel like a local. I enjoy teaching and sharing Chinese culture with you guys!

Hi, 你好！ I am Dana (丹 dān), a professional Mandarin Chinese teacher from China. 
I have a bachelor’s degree in Chinese language and literature，and a Master in Teaching Chinese as a second language. I am also a Certified Chinese teacher Issued by Confucius Institute Headquarters, it’s the only official Mandarin teaching Certificate in China.
Even though I am from the south of China, I have a Standard accent for Mandarin Chinese. I have passed the National Proficiency Test of Putonghua with a high score, 92.6 out of 100.
I have been teaching Chinese for more than 5 years, my students are from all over the world, and from absolute beginner to advanced.

Hello everyone, I'm Emma from China, I have taught Chinese in China and Europe for years. In China, I taught foreign adults and children Chinese and organized culture activities in a Chinese training school. I also worked in an international kindergarten and primary school in Europe, I taught them mathmatics, science, art and other subjects in Chinese. I have visited all european countries while working there, I love teaching Chinese and travelling around the world. If you want to learn Chinese, come join me.

I am Chinese Indonesian currently living in Singapore. I work full-time as an administrator in a school for adults and part-time as a violin teacher. After using italki for a year to learn Italian and French, I started to also give lessons in Mandarin, Indonesian, and English. I spoke English in a native-like C2 level as my Bachelor's degree was conducted in English in Singapore.

Parlo l'italiano a livello B2-C1 e ho insegnato il cinese e l'indonesiano da zero ad alcuni studenti italiani qui su italki. Non ci sarà un problema per me spiegare la grammatica di quelle due lingue in italiano.

Hello! My name is  Phoebe and  I am a native speaker of mandarin . I’m a cheerful girl who love enjoying the life and making  friends.   I have a load of hobbies, such as doing  yoga , cooking delicious food and shopping with  friends. Travelling is my favorites in which I can communicate with local people and  realize various traditional customs . I have visited some countries including Japan, Vietnam, and Thailand, and now I am  live in Sydney.  I am  passionate about teaching and learning, and let's start a funny journey of Chinese learning.

I really enjoy talking with people about  their hobbies , culture, work, family and etc. I am a good listener , I am patient and easygoing , If you want to share something with me, you will always be welcome:)

Here are the reasons why you should choose me):
1. I speak standard Mandarin.
2. I can also speak English well as you might have already noticed from my video. I know a lot of western culture which makes us communicate better.
3. I dedicate to this job on italki. I care very much that the lesson really get the learner to know something and especially I try to do things that learners can't learn by themselves easily.
4. I am very patient. And I only teach authentic Mandarin.
5. I've learned a few languages and I have experience that I can learn fast and efficiently.

我是Katherine，很高兴认识你！我住在首都北京，所以我的普通话非常标准。我可以流利地用英语和中文进行交流沟通。我是一个热情开朗的女孩，很喜欢结识新朋友。
我有很丰富的教学经验，所以我可以根据你的中文水平选择最好的方法帮助你。让我们一起学习吧！✨

-A Chinese (Mandarin) native Speaker

-Currently, a Ph.D. candidate studying sociology (Communication and Journalism)

-A holder of the Certificate of Teachers of Chinese to Speakers of Other Languages

-Have lived three years in English-spoken countries (two years in Australia as a Mandarin teacher and one year in the US as a visiting scholar)

-Speak fluent English as the second language

-An amateur drummer

-A big fan of penguins (admire their resilience, consistency, and cuteness^^)

Hi. I am Jacob from Guangdong, China. My mother languages are Mandarin and Cantonese. I can also speak English, Spanish and Portuguese fluently. I am willing to help you learn any language that I know.

你好！我是来自中国广东的Jacob。我的母语是汉语普通话和粤语。另外，我还会说流利的英语、西班牙语和葡萄牙语。我很愿意和你分享我的语言学习经验！

Hola. Soy Jacob de China. Mis idiomas maternos son chino mandarín y cantonés. Además, puedo hablar inglés, español y portugués con fluidez. Estoy aquí para ayudarte a aprender las lenguas!

Olá! Meu nome é Jacob. Sou chinês e falo mandarim e cantonês como línguas maternas. Além disso, posso falar espanhol, inglês e português fluentemente. Estou aqui para te ajudar a aprender as línguas!

Hi, everyone. This is Cayla from China. I've been teaching IELTS listening and speaking for the last three years after I graduated from the university. I really enjoying teaching and meeting new friends. I will arrange the lesson based on your level, so don't worry and start your Chinese learning with me! I can also speak Korean and Cantonese as well. Just mention this in case you might want to practice as well.

Also, I realized that lots of young children in Hong Kong will have mandarin test, I can do training for them as well.

大家好，我来自中国广东。普通话是我的母语，粤语是我的家乡话，韩语是我的兴趣，我坚信兴趣是最好的老师，每一节课我都将努力做到最好，请不用担心自己的水平，放心地跟我一起学中文吧！

而且我知道很多香港小朋友，有普通话测试，我可以看懂繁体字和简体字，我可以帮他们练习/复习。有需要的家长请找我。

My name is Yi. I Enjoy learning languages and internal physical arts and science and the Bible . I have been teaching English since 2012. I have taught Chinese since 2013.
你好，我叫裔。我喜欢学习语言，科学，和圣经。 从2012年，我就开始了教英语。2013年，我开始了教汉语。
Меня зовут Йи. Мне нравится изучать языки, внутреннее физическое искусство, науку и Библию. Я начал преподать английский язык на 2012 года и китайский с 2013 года.
I particularly enjoy cooking,  literature, classical music, dancing and traveling. I have appreciated magnificent landscape of mountain, river and farmland both in China and abroad.
